## Background

To support the {{< meta country-name >}} National Ecosystem Assessment,
{{< meta country-name >}}'s terrestrial ecosystems were assessed under the 
International Union for the Conservation of Nature (IUCN) Red List of 
Ecosystems Categories and Criteria.

This report describes the development of the IUCN Red List of Ecosystems for
{{< meta country-name >}}, which included:

- A detailed literature review of all published and unpublished material
  relevant to the status of ecosystems in {{< meta country-name >}};
- The development of an ecosystem typology for {{< meta country-name >}}
  suitable for conducting a national scale IUCN Red List of Ecosystems assessment;
- ...
- An expert review process for the ecosystem typology, descriptions and assessments.
